verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
It was there by faith,
I received my sight
And now I am happy
all the day!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Alas and did
my Savior bleed,
And did my sov'reign die?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Would He devote
that sacred head,
For such a worm as I?

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Was it for crimes
that I have done,
He groaned upon the tree?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Amazing pity grace unknown,
And love beyond degree!

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
When Christ
the mighty Maker died,
For man the creature's sin.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Here, Lord, I give
myself to Thee,
'Tis all that I can do!

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Thus might I hide
my blushing face
While Calvary's cross appears,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Dissolve my heart
in thankfulness,
And melt mine eyes
to tears.
